entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
